beer.beer_description:
Cask ABV: 4.2%, Bottle ABV: 4.6%
Light gold in colour, bursting with citrus and tropical hop flavours and sensationally refreshing. The original UK Citra.

In 2009 on his annual hop sourcing visit to the USA, Oakham's Brewing Director John Bryan discovered an exceptional new hop variety - Citra. He rushed it to the UK, ensuring that Oakham Ales were the first UK brewery to brew a beer with 100% Citra hops and maintaining Oakham's reputation for pioneering innovation.

user.bio: Ex Refreshment Coordinator Wheel/Bake/Old Bay Alehouses, Thanet properjob ambassador & cenosilicaphobic

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 35 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 8!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 30 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 7!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 20 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 5!

items.badge_description: It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 5 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 2. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
